about_the_game:
Bring home some holiday feeling and enjoy the detailed airport as well as the fantastic sceneries of the two islands Ibiza and Formentera.

Both islands include accurate coastlines, the newly designed airport in Ibiza, and aerial photography textures with a spectacular resolution of 0.5m/pixels for the islands and 0.25m/pixels for the airport.

The international airport of Ibiza (LEIB) features numerous details and surrounding buildings. Moreover, fully custom SAM jetways as well as PBR ground textures ensure a realistic flight experience.


  • High resolution satellite images (about 0.5m/px) on the whole island
  • Highly detailed airport with a resolution of 0.25m/px
  • Numerous static vehicles like busses, baggage carts, etc.
  • Custom landmark objects
  • Fully customized SAM jetways
  • Highly detailed aerial photograph night textures
  • Compatible with World Traffic
  • PBR ground textures

Bring home some holiday feeling and enjoy the detailed airport as well as the fantastic sceneries of the two islands Ibiza and Formentera.

Both islands include accurate coastlines, the newly designed airport in Ibiza, and aerial photography textures with a spectacular resolution of 0.5m/pixels for the islands and 0.25m/pixels for the airport.

The international airport of Ibiza (LEIB) features numerous details and surrounding buildings. Moreover, fully custom SAM jetways as well as PBR ground textures ensure a realistic flight experience.


  • High resolution satellite images (about 0.5m/px) on the whole island
  • Highly detailed airport with a resolution of 0.25m/px
  • Numerous static vehicles like busses, baggage carts, etc.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU with 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SAM plugin is required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10+
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU with 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SAM plugin is required
